metadata.description: PhD/Postdoc optimized career timeline progression data - PhD-specific entry points, salaries, and accelerated timelines
metadata.scope: Complete dataset - all 31 career paths optimized for PhD transitions
metadata.note: Salary ranges based on 2025 US market data (major tech hubs) with 15-25% PhD premium. Timeline data reflects PhD-accelerated progression (25-30% faster).
changeLog: Repositioned PhD entry points to realistic mid/senior levels
Applied 15-25% PhD salary premiums across all levels
Reduced progression timelines by 25-30% for PhD advantages
Extended pivot opportunities to 3-4 stage career arcs
Added PhD-specific transition fields and academic bridge roles
Corrected salary ranges per 2025 market feedback
Added industry targeting and PhD-friendly company lists
Fixed career level assignments: Principal→lead, Director→exec, VP→exec, Chief→exec, Partner→exec (Aug 31, 2025)
Completed pivot opportunity restoration: Enhanced 6 careers from 1 pivot to 4 pivots with diverse branchFromIndex distribution (Aug 31, 2025)

data_scientist.name: Data Scientist
phdAdvantages: Advanced statistical modeling and experimental design
Independent research project management
Deep domain expertise for specialized ML applications
Publication record demonstrates analytical rigor
phdTransitionTips: Highlight quantitative research methodologies as 'data science frameworks'
Frame dissertation analysis as 'large-scale data pipeline development'
Emphasize cross-disciplinary collaboration as 'stakeholder management'
Translate academic presentations to 'executive communication skills'

compensationNotes.phdNegotiationTip: Emphasize research publication record and technical depth for top salary band

r_and_d_scientist.name: R&D Scientist
phdAdvantages: Deep technical expertise enables breakthrough innovation
Independent research skills translate to autonomous project leadership
Publication record demonstrates thought leadership capability
Experimental design expertise critical for R&D success
phdTransitionTips: Frame thesis research as 'product development lifecycle'
Highlight lab management as 'cross-functional team leadership'
Emphasize grant writing as 'business case development'
Position failed experiments as 'iterative optimization methodology'

compensationNotes.phdNegotiationTip: Leverage publication impact factor and patent applications for premium positioning
